subject_terms_3: Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Photography
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph with colour. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. A set of railroad and a traffic light to the left of the photograph can be seen. The train has more than one carriage attached to it and it has two rows of windows on its side. There are a number of different colours which are only on the body of the locomotive, while the rest of the photograph is in monochrome. There are colourful images of butterflies and flora that are coloured on the body of the locomotive.
sgcool_label_text: "This image is part of the ""Tracking Memories"" collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore
subject_terms_1: locomotives railroads (infrastructures) trains (vehicle groupings) passenger cars (railroad cars)
